MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL32 postcode area of Conwy. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 6:58PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite complications and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:30AM on 03 November 2020.
